ShortDescription: A feature-packed smartphone with a large display and long battery life.
Specification: 6.5-inch HD+ IPS display, MediaTek Helio G70 processor, 4GB RAM, 64GB storage, 5000mAh battery.

ShortDescription: A spacious and energy-efficient refrigerator with advanced cooling technology.

ShortDescription: A high-quality 4K UHD TV with vibrant colors and immersive sound.

ShortDescription: An energy-efficient inverter AC with smart cooling features for ultimate comfort.
